body:
>Spack install mumps%intel+complex+double+float~int64+metis+mpi+parmetis+ptscotch+scotch ~shared

I get an error when building static libs of MUMPS.

 24    ar vrlibpord.a graph.o gbipart.o gbisect.o ddcreate.o ddbisect.o nestdiss.o multisector.o gelim.o bucket.o tree.o symbfac.o interface.o sort.o minpriority.o
 25    ar: two different operation options specified
 26    Makefile:28: recipe for target 'libpord.a' failed

I changed the mumps/package.py file. From 'AR = ar vr' to 'AR = ar vr '.
Inserted a space after vr that solved the error I mentioned above. After changing it, everything worked as it should be.
title: Bugfix/mumps static build fix
